of the Landgren and Collins Families

Family Tree Lineage Index
Johan Bengtsson

Johan Bengtsson was born on the 26th of July, 1792 to Marna Carlsdotter and Bengt Johansson in Stubbarp, Gödelöv parish, Malmöhus county (1A). Johan lived in Stubbarp, Gödelöv parish with his family until he left in 1810 (1D) to spend a year in Kyrkoköpinge parish before returning home (1E). The family then moved to Genarp No. 11 1/4 in 1812 where Johan presumably met his future wife (1F) When Johan married Hanna Ohlsdotter around 1815, he moved to her family’s farm or village in Espet and the two of them stayed there until Johan’s death (1G, 1N).

On October 27, 1815, their first daughter, Elna Johansdotter was born in Espethus, Genarp parish, Malmöhus county (1H). When she was two years old she was sent to live with Hanna’s parents Ola Fredricksson and Kjerstina Larsdotter in Skogledhus in Genarp parish (1G). Two years later, in 1820, she was living once again with her parents in Espehus (1I). She lived with her family in Espehus/Espet 13 until sometime in the mid 1830s (1K). Johan continued to live in Espet until his death. On the 6th of September, 1857, Johan Bengtsson passed away at the age of 45(1N).

References

Biography

Johan Bengtsson was born on the 26th of July, 1792 to Marna Carlsdotter and Bengt Johansson in Stubbarp, Gödelöv parish, Malmöhus county (1A). Johan lived in Stubbarp, Gödelöv parish with his family until he left in 1810 (1D) to spend a year in Kyrkoköpinge parish before returning home (1E). The family then moved to Genarp No. 11 1/4 in 1812 where Johan presumably met his future wife (1F) When Johan married Hanna Ohlsdotter around 1815, he moved to her family’s farm or village in Espet and the two of them stayed there until Johan’s death (1G, 1N).

On October 27, 1815, their first daughter, Elna Johansdotter was born in Espethus, Genarp parish, Malmöhus county (1H). When she was two years old she was sent to live with Hanna’s parents Ola Fredricksson and Kjerstina Larsdotter in Skogledhus in Genarp parish (1G). Two years later, in 1820, she was living once again with her parents in Espehus (1I). She lived with her family in Espehus/Espet 13 until sometime in the mid 1830s (1K). Johan continued to live in Espet until his death. On the 6th of September, 1857, Johan Bengtsson passed away at the age of 45(1N).
